text: ya min amantum biallah walyawm alakhir la tudhhibuu thawab ma ttsdqwn bih balmnn waladha, fhdha shabih bialadhi yakhruj malah lyrah alnas, fyuthnu elyh, wahu laa yumin biallah wala ywqn bialyawm alakhr, fmthl dhlk mithl hajar amls ealayh turab htl ealayh mtr ghzyr fazah eanh altrab, fatarakah amls la shay' elyh, fkdhlk hwla' almrawwn tdmhll 'aemalahum eind allh, wala yajidun shyyana min althawab ealaa ma anfqwh. wallah la yuafiq alkafirin li'iisabat alhaqa fi nafaqatuhum wghyrha
